title: Bug 124620: Referenced Parameter icon should be invalid if the parameter in library is deleted
SR:
1. Insert a report scalar parameter.
2. Create a report and use the above library.
3. In the library explorer, pull the parameter to the data explorer view of the report.
4. Open the library file and delete the parameter.
5. Reopen the report design file. The icon of the parameter should appear as invalid or indicate that it has been deleted.
